name: Java Good Night
description: This rum-laced take on Thai iced coffee is made with Blue Bottle's New Orleans-style cold brew coffee.
recipeIngredient: 2 ounces Blue Bottle New Orleans-style cold brew coffee

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly muddle mint leaves in the bottom of a mixing glass. Add cold brew coffee, rum, sweetened condensed milk, evaporated milk, and bitters and fill with ice. Stir until well chilled, about 20 seconds.
Strain into a tall glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with mint sprig and serve.
